articles.title: ‘Sonic Colours: Ultimate’ European physical release has been delayed - NME
articles.description: Sega has announced 'Sonic Colours: Ultimate' delayed release date for physical copies.
articles.content:
Sega has announced that Sonic Colours: Ultimate will have a delayed release date for physical copies. The digital version will still release on September 7.

articles.title: Rugby: Captain Sam Whitelock, Aaron Smith 'unlikely' to join All Blacks for Rugby Championship - Newshub
articles.description: The All Blacks will leave for Australia and Europe on Thursday, without two of their key players.
articles.content:
The All Blacks will likely depart for their bumper road trip to Australia and Europe without two of their key players - including their captain.
